name: The Gardener (shuhmo)
description:
After the apocalypse those who remained were left to scavenge. Supplies run low and those around you begin to lose hope. Another day, another path to search.

You stumble across a worn down shed. It seems like not everything has been destroyed... If these can grow we might just make it.

PLATFORM: GBA

CONTROLS:

SPACE to interact 

WASD to move

THE TEAM:  

Shuhmo: everything else 

Pxlanni: custom art,  box art, custom sfx (using Plogue chipsounds) (https://pxlanni.itch.io/)

OTHER CREDITS: 

Music by https://soundcloud.com/harayuu (Menu & tutorial BGM: 8bit 02 - Ruins Sleep, Game BGM:  8bit 04 - Night Walking). 

Palette "BLUEM0LD" by warpixel on lospec (https://lospec.com/palette-list/bluem0ld)

Font: Press Start 2P by CodeMan38 (https://fonts.google.com/specimen/Press+Start+2P)

CREATOR COMMENTS: 

The inspiration was "harvest moon, but post-apocalyptic". I really liked the idea of growing new life in an otherwise desolate setting. 

I would add comments by shuhmo, but he is already asleep by now.
